get_lowest_fuel_price.name: get_lowest_fuel_price
get_lowest_fuel_price.description: Get the lowest fuel price in the neighbourhood of a specific location defined by postalcode and town (optional).

fuel_type.name: fuel_type
fuel_type.description: The type of fuel to look for, supported options: super95, super98, diesel or lpg

country.name: country
country.description: The country to look for, supported options: BE/DE/FR/IT/LU/NL/ES/US

max_distance.name: max_distance
max_distance.description: Max distance in km around postal code to look for lowest fuel price, eg search 5km around postal code

filter.name: filter
filter.description: (Optional) Filter out only specific supplier brands, leave empty if any supplier brand is allowed
